file.name: openapi-with-url-refs.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /pet:
    parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/path-param'
    put:
      parameters:
        - $ref: 'https://someexternal.schema'
        - $ref: ./param-b.yaml
        - name: test
    get:
      parameters:
        - $ref: 'http://someexternal.schema'
        - $ref: ./param-c.yaml
components:
  parameters:
    path-param:
      name: path_param

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: parameters: "path-param": parameter MUST contain either a schema property, or a content property
